name: stock-event-analyzer
description: Stock Event Analyzer - Full Stack Application

scripts.start: npm run kill-ports && echo "Starting both servers..." && start "Backend" cmd /k "cd stock-event-analyzer-backend && npm start" && timeout /t 3 > nul && start "Frontend" cmd /k "cd stock-event-analyzer-frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.start:clean: npm run kill-ports && npm run start
scripts.start:backend: npm run kill-ports && cd stock-event-analyzer-backend && npm start
scripts.start:frontend: npm run kill-ports && cd stock-event-analyzer-frontend && npm run dev
scripts.kill-ports: taskkill /f /im node.exe >nul 2>&1 || echo "No Node processes to kill"
scripts.install:all: cd stock-event-analyzer-backend && npm install && cd ../stock-event-analyzer-frontend && npm install
